scripts.init:windows: pnpm -C gui install && python -m venv pyenv && pyenv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.init:linux: pnpm -C gui install && python3 -m venv pyenv && source pyenv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:linux: echo 'building...' && pnpm -C gui run build && source pyenv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic && sudo systemctl restart nginx && uwsgi --ini uwsgi.ini
